list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a structure of planks or plates, approximately horizontal, extending across a ship or boat at any of various levels, especially one of those at the highest level and open to the weather.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he stood on the deck of his flagship
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đứng trên boong tàu của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a component or unit in sound-reproduction equipment that incorporates a playing or recording mechanism for discs or tapes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car has cruise control and a tape deck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe có Cruise Control và một sàn băng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decorate or adorn brightly or festively.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ingrid was decked out in her Sunday best
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ingrid đã được trang bị trong chủ nhật của mình tốt nhất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: knock (someone) to the ground with a punch.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Lisa threatened to deck her if she didn't stop filming
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lisa đe dọa sẽ boong cô ấy nếu cô ấy không ngừng quay phim
